experiences.name: Opinary
experiences.description: As part of the product team I have helped develop tools that help publishers and brands reach, understand and convert their most valuable audiences, using React, Redux ,Sagas, Flow, Relesect and other cutting edge tools in the Front End, we create resilient services that receive more than 5 million users per week

projects.name: DEV IO FOUNDATION
projects.description: The main idea of DEVIO Foundation is to unite all development groups in one place, making it possible to contribute actively to the growth of local community development.

projects.name: GDG FORTALEZA
projects.description: Google developer groups (GDG), community built for developers interested in Google's technology; Everything from Android, Chrome, Drive, and Google Cloud platforms, to product APIs like the Cast API, Maps API, and YouTube API.

projects.name: FRONT-IN FORTALEZA
projects.description: Front-in Fortaleza (FIF) was born as a Front-End conference, today we are the second largest development event in Fortaleza-CE, Our goal is to unite the development community and share knowledge.
